description:
Magic Water, grants +2 Mana.

(2) Spell Burn, discard a spell, gain +3 mana.

Reinforcements, every time a guard dies, roll a D6. If you roll a 5,6 the guard is not discarded and can still be used.

(2) Call for Help, draw the top 2 civilian cards, if they are guards, keep them, otherwise discard them.

Purity, dark magic spells cannot be used.

(4) Holy Purge, all skeletons die instantly on this space, you cannot collect the xp, but you can collect the treasures.

Vantage Point, get +1 to your next map roll and subtract -2 from this lands movement restriction.

(2) Light the Fires, exploration costs nothing.
Pillage, draw 4 items, if they are consumables: food or potions, keep them, otherwise discard them.

Owners, draw two civilians, if one is hostile, discard the other card if it is friendly.  Otherwise, keep the cards.  Hostiles will attack inside the house, which means no other civilians/guards can help.
Stew, if you use potions or food (consumables) +1 to their effectiveness.

Awakening, if a skeleton does not exist here, draw the top card from the creature deck, if it is a skeleton, play it.

Undead, everytime a skeleton dies, roll a D6, on a 1 or 2, the skeleton comes back to life.
(3) Enter the Mine, +5 gold this turn.

Wall, increase the armor bonus given by all items by +1.

(1) Out of Reach, get +1 range and +1 damage to all weapons.
Beds, if you rest here, get +2 bonus to heal and +1 bonus to XP.  Costs you 1 gold.
Bridge, movement cost is reduced by -2 on rivers and shores.
Your vision is reduced, draw 1 less map card on your next turn.
Any buildings/structures revealed are on fire and can't be used.

You cannot interact with any of the local people on the current map card, unless you cure them.

Roll a D6, on a 1, keep this card with you, until you can find a cure, lose 1 health each turn, including this one.
No event, it is a sunny day.
The movement value of the current map card is increased by +2.
The movement value of the current map card is increased by +2.
The movement value of the current map card is increased by +2.
The movement value of the current map card is increased by +2.
The movement value of the current map card is increased by +2.
The movement value of the current map card is increased by +2.

Heal +2.

(3) Heal an additional 2 points.

Heal +1.

(1) Heal an additional point.

Heal +1.

(x) Heal an additional point for every 2 cards (x) played.

Reroll any die result.

(1) Reroll another die result or the same die result a second time.

(3) Regenerate the entire map instantly, can be used while engaged in combat.

All cards played for a single attack or block (sidways and otherwise) can be converted into a single attack or block type of your choice.

(2) Use this card for both an attack and block.

Gain an additional +2xp while resting.

(4) Gain double the experience for killing a monster.
